title: Kung Pao Chicken
desc: Stir-fried chicken with peanuts, vegetables, and a spicy sauce.

title: Pad Thai
desc: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and lime.

title: Sushi Platter
desc: Assortment of fresh sushi rolls and nigiri served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Tom Yum Soup
desc: Spicy and sour soup with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and lime leaves.

title: Yangzhou Fried Rice
desc: Yangzhou style fried rice, serving with bean and pickles

title: Onigiri
desc: Rice Sandwich, serving with soy sauce

title: Jajangmyeon
desc: Black bean sauce noodle, serving with green onion

title: Ma Yi Shang Shu
desc: Hot pepper sauce noodle, serving with soy bean and onion

title: Doroyaki
desc: Red bean paste dessert, serving with honey.

title: Chicken Ramen
desc: Chicken noodle soup, serving with vegetables such as soy bean, green onion. In an optional you can ask for egg.

title: Bibimbap
desc: Boiling vegetables, serving with special hot sauce

title: Dan Dan Mian
desc: Dan dan noodle, serving with green onion

title: Tteokbokki
desc: Spicy rice cakes, serving with fish cake.

title: Bulgogi
desc: Marinated grilled beef served with rice and assorted side dishes.

title: Miso Soup
desc: Traditional Japanese soup made with soybean paste, tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

title: Hainanese Chicken Rice
desc: Poached chicken served with fragrant rice, cucumber slices, and chili sauce.

title: Kimchi Fried Rice
desc: Fried rice with spicy kimchi, vegetables, and your choice of meat or tofu.

title: Green Curry
desc: Spicy Thai curry with coconut milk, green chili, bamboo shoots, and your choice of meat or vegetables.

title: Egg Drop Soup
desc: Light Chinese soup made with beaten eggs, chicken broth, and green onions.

title: Tempura
desc: Assortment of lightly battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables.
